EN: Prints help message equal to this
Just a debug command for testers
Used to login into account or create new one
Changes current language. To get all languages use "lang"
Displays the player's status. Use "self" as name to show your status
Send the password to the username email
Shows wiki about the game. To get more information use "wiki"
Use "chat add <username>" to add chat with player. Use "chat remove <username>" to remove chat with player
Use "equip <item_name>" where "item name" type is armor, weapon or heal to equip your person
The name "{}" is busy or the password is incorrect
Incorrect login. Use also lowercase English letters, numbers, symbols "_" and "-"
You successfully created new account with name "{}". Don't lose your password!
This name can't be used. Please, enter other name
The recipient address "{}" is not a valid RFC-5321 address.
Available arguments: all, ammo, armor, heal, material, melee, range
Incorrect category. Use "wiki" to get all categories
